overview: Carmen (Vasalki) and her brothers Lucas (Cirerol Sansores) and Martin are arrested for protecting a fugitive indigenous person. Carmen also refused the romantic overtures of a Spanish official (Viñas). Although their conspiracy is prematurely revealed. Father Hildalgo (Varela) and other Mexicans begin the revolt against Spain. Carmen and her sweetheart Nicolas are liberated.
title: 1810 or The Liberators of Mexico
